title: 空岛Asy插件如何设置漏斗限制和刷怪限制求了
author: ~~~阳~~~

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PY狗 于 2018-7-8 17:43 编辑 

把前面的#去掉就生效了.也可以自己加

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
config找到这个
   entitylimits:
     # 下面的是生物限制
     #BAT: 10
     #BLAZE: 10
     #BOAT: 10
     #CAVE_SPIDER: 10
     #CHICKEN: 10
     #COW: 10
     #CREEPER: 10
     #DONKEY: 10
     #ENDERMAN: 10
     #HORSE: 10
     #HUSK: 10
     #IRON_GOLEM: 10
     #LLAMA: 10
     #MAGMA_CUBE: 10
     #MULE: 10
     #MUSHROOM_COW: 10
     #OCELOT: 10
     #PIG: 10
     #PIG_ZOMBIE: 10
     #POLAR_BEAR: 10
     #RABBIT: 10
     #SHEEP: 10
     #SKELETON: 10
     #SKELETON_HORSE: 10
     #SLIME: 10
     #SNOWMAN: 10
     #SPIDER: 10
     #SQUID: 10
     #STRAY: 10
     #WITCH: 10
     #WITHER: 10
     #WITHER_SKELETON: 10
     #WOLF: 10
     #ZOMBIE: 10
     #ZOMBIE_HORSE: 10
     #ZOMBIE_VILLAGER: 10     
     # 这些是限制的方块。
     #BANNER: 20
     #ITEM_FRAME: 30
     #FURNACE: 10
     #CHEST: 50
     #TRAPPED_CHEST: 50
     #ENDER_CHEST: 1
     #JUKEBOX: 5
     #DISPENSER: 5
     #DROPPER: 5
     #SIGN: 10
     #MOB_SPAWNER: 10
     #NOTE_BLOCK: 5
     #ENCHANTMENT_TABLE: 5
     #BEACON: 12
     #SKULL: 50
     #DAYLIGHT_DETECTOR: 10
     HOPPER: 30
     #REDSTONE_COMPARATOR: 30
     #FLOWER_POT: 20
     #PAINTING: 5
     #ARMOR_STAND: 5
     #BREWING_STAND: 20
